name: Down Bringer
description:
Epic MegaJam 11-2019 Entry

Theme : Down to Earth

You are working in a company that brings people with their heads in the clouds, down to earth. You job is to find these people and bring them back from the clouds.

Controls:

Movement - W/A/S/D

Jump - Space bar

Run - Hold Left Shift

Melee Attack - Left Mouse Button
